name: House Salad
description: Iceberg, tofu, carrots, broccoli, red onion, cauliflower, and tomato. Served with a spicy peanut dressing on the side.

name: Yum Nua
description: Thai beef salad served with lettuce, cucumber, and tomato in a spicy lime dressing. Gluten-free.  Please specify – mild, medium, hot, Thai hot.

name: Yum Woon Sen
description: Steamed bean thread noodles combined with minced chicken, shrimp, lettuce, cucumber, and tomato in a spicy lime dressing. Can also be made with tofu. Gluten-free. Please specify – mild, medium, hot, Thai hot.

name: Yum Woon Sen
description: Steamed bean thread noodles combined with minced chicken, shrimp, lettuce, cucumber, and tomato in a spicy lime dressing. Can also be made with tofu. Gluten-free.
